item.content:encoded:

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $1,199.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:23:42 UTC – Details)


FEATURES OF 27 INCH TOUCH-SCREEN SMART MIRROR BATHROOM TV

  • Functions:  ATV/DTV/Monitor
  • Protection Grade:  IP66
  • Control type:  Touch screen for 10 Point-Touch Control
  • Speaker:  Built-in Waterproof Speaker
  • Remote Controller:  IP68 Waterproof
  • WiFi & Bluetooth:  Supported (Integrated) 
  • RAM+ROM:  4G+64G
  • Screen Size (Diagonal):  27″
  • Unit Size:  678 * 448 * 44mm / 26.69″W * 17.64″H * 1.73″D
  • Unit Weight:  14KGs
  • Package Size:  780 * 550 * 140mm / 30.70″W * 21.65″H * 5.51″D
  • Gross Weight: 16kgs
  • Finish:  Mirror
  • Front Panel Material:  Glass
  • Interface: TV / USBx2 / HDMIx1 / LAN /Audio Out /DC 12V
  • Android System:  Android 11.0 (APPS or GAMES download available )
  • Power Input: 12V (Adapter for 100-240V input is available as accessory)
  • Display Type: LED
  • Aspect Ratio: 16:9
  • Brightness(Cd/m2): 500
  • Resolution: 1920×1080
  • Response Time:  6ms
  • Viewing Angle (H/V): 178/178(H/V)
  • Built-in Speakers: 2pcs
  • Standby Power: Under 1W
  • Power Consumption: 60W
  • Working Environment:  -30 to 50 degree
  • Working Humidity: 10%-90%
  • Install:  Recess Dimensions for in-wall (656 * 432 * 33mm/25.8″W * 17″H * 1.3″D), or Wall Bracket Dimensions for on-wall 27″(VESA100 * 100mm)
  • Accessories: Waterproof Controller(Without batteries)/Manual/ 100-240V Adapter/Power Cord/Wall Bracket/Embedded Back/Install tool.

【Awesome Configuration】27-inch screen with 1080p high-definition pixels and high brightness, built-In 2pcs powerful vibration speakers, which you can easily connect Wi-Fi and Bluetooth in HDMI 2 channel, high configuration RAM:4 GB, ROM:64 GB, built-in Android 11.0 system, HD screen provides high quality vivid pictures and a better viewing experience.
【Use scene】As long as the switch of the display is turned off, it is a practical high-definition mirror. Smart mirror IP66 waterproof TV，Especially suitable for some humid or extreme places, such as bathrooms, washing room, show room kitchens, swimming pools, yachts, Sauna, salon, spa, hotel, hot tubs, steam rooms, etc. You can use Smart mirror display with your friends anytime, anywhere.
【Simple Installation】 “In-wall” and “On-wall” options : The waterproof bathroom TV can be fitted either built into the wall recess or secured to the wall itself. The waterproof TVs come included with a wall-mount and recess mounting bracket in the package. Easily to tightly fix the television to the desired spot. Recess Dimensions for In-wall: 656 x 432 x 33mm/25.8″W x 17″H x 1.3″D.
【Quality Guarantee】leotachi Smart mirror TV comes with 1-year-warranty. Please don’t hesitate to contact us for more details and all messages will be replied within 24 hours.

Price: $1,199.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:23:42 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Haocrown 27 inch Bathroom TV Mirror with Smart Touch Screen

The big achievement of Haocrown waterproof bathroom TV is full touch screen which using projected capacitive 10-point touch technology for fluid response.

With updated H2 quad-core chipset and smooth touch brilliant screen, you can save more time and control the TV and enjoy more entertainment.

Even the TV screen is wet with water, you can easily and safely browse through all the available options, choose your favorite programs, change the volume and turn on/off the TV with simply touch control.

Control TV with Voice Remote

Come with IP68 waterproof remote and Bluetooth voice remote.

Built-in Dolby Atmos

Support external ceiling speakers, build up cinematic surround sound.

Easy to Connect

Easy to connect 5GHz/2.4GHz wi-fi, Bluetooth, cable TV, external HDMI devices etc.

1 Voice Control 2 Built-in Dolby Atmos 3 Easy to Connect

Shared Experience from Our Customers Terrific Touchscreen Bath TV

The set’s image is bright and sharp. The mirror face when off and the picture when the TV set is on, both look great. Touchscreen feature is fabulous.

Excellent product

Very easy to fit. Picture is good, and it is magical when it sits behind the mirror. Looks great works great. Better than expected.

Working Good

Great product . Easy to set up and very easy to get on WiFi. Adding a speaker definitely improves the sound.

Bathroom Mirror TV

Love this TV in my bathroom. The mirror looks like a 100% mirror when TV is off.

LED Screen Display Size: 27 inch (Diagonal) Finished Surface： Mirror (High quality nano-silver glass) IP66 Waterproof Rating: Triple waterproof treatment, anti-fog, dust-proof Three Control Types: Full touch screen control & Bluetooth voice remote & IP68 Waterproof IR remote Built-in Smart System: Android 11.0 (Updated H2 Chip), better, smarter and safer RAM 8GB & ROM 64GB: Large memory support running smoother and more stable system. Wireless Connections: Dual band 5Ghz/2.4GHz wi-fi, Bluetooth 4.2. Updated Highlight LED Screen: Brightness 500 offer brighter and vivid television picture quality. Resolution: 1920×1080, 16:9, 178° H/ V viewing angles. Cable TV Channel Support: Built-in ATSC tuner, support digital TV programmes. Speakers: Built-in two waterproof speakers(8Ω x 5W), support 3.5mm audio output interface. Support Interfaces: HDMI, LAN, TV Input, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Audio Output, DV 12V Input. Product Dimensions: 26.7 x 17.6 x 1.7 inch Package Weight: 33.5 bl Installations: Wall mounted or recessed into wall installations Package List: 1 x 27-inch Touchscreen Mirror TV, 1 x IP68 Waterproof Remote Control, 1 x Bluetooth Remote, 1 x Embedded Bracket, 1 x Wall Bracket, 1 x Installation Manual, 1 x HDMI Cable

Safe Waterproof TV for Bathroom: All Haocrown waterproof TVs have passed IP66 high waterproof rating, triple waterproof treatment, anti-fog, dust proof and powered with safe low voltage DC 12V, which specially designed for using in any humid and dust conditions, such as luxury bathroom, saunas, hotel spa, kitchen etc.
2-IN-1 Vanishing TV Mirror Design: The bathroom TV is completely embedded within a luxury mirror. Vanishing glass technology makes it possible for a television to completely disappear when turned off. Haocrown high brightness 500 LED television panels are brighter than typical indoor TVs, delivering you smooth high-definition images.
Running Smart Android 11.0 System and HDTV Digital TV: Comes with smart Android 11.0 system in HDMI 2 channel, resolution 1920×1080, easy to connect dual band 5GHz/2.4GHz wi-fi, Bluetooth, explore your favorite shows via rang of apps like YouTube, Netflix etc. RAM 8GB, ROM 64GB, upgraded H2 chip and large memory make ensure running programs better, smarter and safer. Built-in ATSC tuner, supports digital HDTV programs.
Easy to Install, Wall Mounts Inchuded: The 27 inch waterproof bathroom tv can be fitted either recessed mount (in wall) or surface mount (on wall). The package will come with both embedded bracket and wall bracket and full installation manual. We offer customized service and worry-free 12-month experience and 12-hour kindly customer response. Contact us by below steps: Go to the product page– click ” Haocrown-us” (under “Add to Cart”), then click “Ask a question”.

Previous page

  2. Haocrown is a manufacturer specializing in waterproof televisions, it was founded in 2012 with its opportunities gained from modernizing science and technology and smart home market trend continues to grow.

    With IP66 waterproof and powered with safe low voltage DC 12V specific design, updated smart mirror touch screen function, Haocrown waterproof indoor TVs are widely used luxury hotel, bathroom, shower, steam room any wet and humid conditions.

(as of Nov 29,2022 05:32:50 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The CT-2860 delivers stunning light, dark and rich colors with crystal clear, sharp 720p resolution on a 28-inch LED HDTV. There is a TV Stand included.

1 A Perfect Fit 2 Unmatched Support 3 Stunning Audio & Video 4 Enjoy the Action! 5 Multiple Connections

VESA Wall Mount Pattern and TV Dimensions

This TV has a Universal VESA Pattern of 100×100 which is one of the most common patterns, meaning it will fit most TV Wall Mounts that are manufactured.

VESA is a universally known measurement of TV mounts used with most TV companies around the world.A VESA hole pattern is measured in both horizontal and vertical distance between mounting holes.

For example, VESA 100 x 100 means your TV mounting holes are 100mm apart horizontally and 100mm apart vertically.

Specifications

Screen Size 28″ Display Resolution 1366 x 768 TV and Stand (WxHxD) 22.8 x 17.2 x 7.1” TV w/o Stand (WxHxD) 25.5 x 15.4 x 2.8” Viewing Angle 178° x 178° Response Time 8ms Broadcast System NTSC/ATSC/QAM Max Audio Output 2 x 8 W VESA Standard 100 x 100 mm Power Supply AC 100-240V 60Hz Power Consumption <45 W Weight 10.3 lbs. USB File Play Allows guests to play MP3 and view JPG files, as well as charge mobile devices

VESA WALL MOUNT READY – The compact, lightweight design makes it quick and easy to mount on your wall. The VESA pattern on this TV is 100×100 which is one of the most common VESA patterns, meaning it will easily fit with most wall mounts you can purchase today. You can also check out our full range of wall mounts by visiting our store.
STUNNING VIDEO AND AUDIO – Enjoy your favorite movies, shows and sports on the 28 inch, 720p, 60Hz LED Television screen which delivers stunning light, dark and rich colors. Pairing with the clarity of the screen is the stunning audio through our state-of-the-art, built-in speakers. Entertainment at the touch of a button!
FULL FUNCTION REMOTE – Control your Television on one simple-to-use remote control. Batteries Included. Easily programmable to any universal remote you may have.
UNMATCHED CUSTOMER SERVICE – Backed by the Continu.us 1 year warranty, our friendly technical support team is always here to help you. Our offices are in the USA in Eastern Time, and you can reach out to us through phone or email.
